name: Dunning-Kruger Effect
description:
Controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move around and interact.

Hello! This is a submission for the public transport (bitsy jam). It's my first ever bitsy game and was made in a rush, so apologies for any rough design >.<

Script by my dearest friend Juliana He. Music 02 Train by Sergey Cheremisinov. Plugins by bitsy hacks. Special thanks to another dearest friend of mine Shan Gao who brainstormed this idea with me.

Feel free to leave a comment to let me know what you think! Hope you enjoy:)
